title: 98/162/EC: Council Decision of 16 February 1998 amending Decision 95/514/EC on the equivalence of field inspections carried out in third countries on seed- producing crops and on the equivalence of seed produced in third countries
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 16 February 1998 amending Decision 95/514/EC on the equivalence of field inspections carried out in third countries on seed-producing crops and on the equivalence of seed produced in third countries (98/162/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: In Article 6 of Decision 95/514/EC '31 December 1997` shall be replaced by '31 December 1999`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 February 1998.
For the Council
The President
J. CUNNINGHAM
(1) OJ 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2290/66. Directive as last amended by Directive 96/72/EC (OJ L 304, 27. 11. 1996, p. 10).
(2) OJ 125, 11. 7. 1996, p. 2298/66. Directive as last amended by Directive 96/72/EC (OJ L 304, 27. 11. 1996, p. 10).
(3) OJ 125, 11. 7. 1996, p. 2309/66. Directive as last amended by Directive 96/72/EC (OJ L 304, 27. 11. 1996, p. 10).
(4) OJ L 169, 10. 7. 1996, p. 3. Directive as last amended by Directive 96/72/EC (OJ L 304, 27. 11. 1996, p. 10).
(5) OJ L 296, 9. 12. 1995, p. 34. Decision as last amended by Decision 97/33/EC (OJ L 13, 16. 1. 1997, p. 31).
